# Yogas, Tithi, Karana, and Panchanga Combinations

Panchanga elements are daily time-structure variables derived from Sunâ€“Moon dynamics [@surya_siddhanta]. All combinations are included.

## Tithi

$$
Tithi = \left\lfloor \frac{(\lambda_{Moon}-\lambda_{Sun}) \bmod 360}{12} \right\rfloor + 1
$$

## Karana

$$
KaranaIndex = \left\lfloor \frac{(\lambda_{Moon}-\lambda_{Sun}) \bmod 360}{6} \right\rfloor + 1
$$

## Yoga

$$
Yoga = \left\lfloor \frac{(\lambda_{Moon}+\lambda_{Sun}) \bmod 360}{13.3333} \right\rfloor + 1
$$

All 30 tithis, 11 karana types, and 27 yogas are enumerated in the catalog.
